attributes.title: do NOT get this app

attributes.title: listen to the negative reviews.
attributes.review: After giving the app my phone number i have started receiving multiple scam calls for the past week, this is one of the few apps i have on my phone. My bank account has also been reported to have had some "suspicious" activity causing all my credit cards to be temporarily suspended. Im not saying the two are linked, but this wasn't happening before. Do not trust this app.
